documents.title: Fullstack API Platform for Dashboards and Reporting
documents.content:
[![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)\
\
Blog\
====](https://quill.co/blog)

[Product\
=======](https://quill.co/)
[Docs\
====](https://docs.quillsql.com/)
[Jobs\
====](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/quill/jobs/)

[See Quill](https://cal.com/quillsql/30min)

![decisiontree](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/decisiontree.2829aade.svg)

Why Users Want Customer-Facing Analytics
========================================

#### Due to low barriers to entry, abundant capital, and tens of thousands of ambitious founders, the SaaS industry has become one of the most competitive markets in the world. As a result, customers‚Äô expectations have risen dramatically.

Read more

#### Product

#### October 1, 2024

Brief Overview of the Modern Data Stack
=======================================

#### Ok, but what actually is the Modern Data Stack?

Read more

#### Product

#### September 26, 2024

The Evolution of Business Intelligence and the Emergence of Embedded BI
=======================================================================

#### For many SaaS product managers, business intelligence (BI) is a familiar tool that has shaped decision-making and product development for decades. But the rise of embedded BI has introduced new possibilities and challenges, especially in the fast-evolving SaaS ecosystem. In this article, we‚Äôll explore the history of traditional BI, its limitations, and how embedded BI emerged as a product category in the 2000s.

Read more

#### Product

#### July 26, 2024

Why the Modern Data Stack Doesn‚Äôt Replace Embedded Analytics
============================================================

#### While the modern data stack offers robust data capabilities, it also has limitations.

Read more

#### Product

#### July 23, 2024

Why Users Want Customer-Facing Analytics
========================================

#### Due to low barriers to entry, abundant capital, and tens of thousands of ambitious founders, the SaaS industry has become one of the most competitive markets in the world. As a result, customers‚Äô expectations have risen dramatically.

Read more

#### Product

#### July 19, 2024

Why SaaS Companies Offer Customer-Facing Analytics
==================================================

#### Just like the look & feel of analytics may differ, you‚Äôll hear various explanations for why a specific company wants to offer customer-facing analytics

Read more

#### Product

#### July 12, 2024

Don‚Äôt build ChatGPT for X. Focus on where ChatGPT doesn‚Äôt solve X
=================================================================

#### A lot of AI products are essentially ChatGPT for X, but oftentimes ChatGPT is not the ideal user experience for X. Instead of trying to make a better chatbot than OpenAI, focusing on solving X specifically will often lead to a very different UX (not a chat interface).

Read more

#### Product

#### July 5, 2024

What is ‚Äúcustomer-facing analytics‚Äù?
====================================

#### ‚ÄúCustomer-facing analytics‚Äù describes any data or insights feature in your product that your end-users interact with. Customer-facing analytics are ubiquitous across all kinds of software products, whether consumer, B2B, marketplace, data app, or tech-enabled service. Some common examples of customer-facing analytics are charts & graphs, data tables, dashboards, reporting tools, or even self-service analytics.

Read more

metadata.description: Fastest way to build dashboards and reporting in your app

documents.title: Fullstack API Platform for Dashboards and Reporting
documents.content:
Fullstack API Platform for Dashboards and Reporting

Add  
to your app
=================

The React Library, API, and Management Toolkit, purpose built for customer-facing reporting and dashboards.

The React Library, API, and Management Toolkit,  
purpose built for customer-facing reporting and dashboards.

Modular building blocks for every use case
==========================================

Build any reporting workflow, using your own codebase and UI library.

[Y\
\
Backed by Y Combinator](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/quill)

How it works
============

1
-

Connect your database or create an endpoint
===========================================

CloudQuill SDK

app.quill.co

Connect database

![Postgres](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/postgres.a4e35b1b.svg)

![Snowflake](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/snowflake.ccdeb78d.svg)

![Redshift](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/redshift.c44d2ddb.svg)

![Bigquery](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/bigquery.3c458eb6.svg)

Connect

2
-

Create dashboards in Quill
==========================

app.quill.co

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/charts.ab4b31a8.svg)

3
-

Add Quill to your app in a few lines of code
============================================

    import { QuillProvider, Dashboard }   from "@quillsql/react"   <QuillProvider>     <Dashboard name="transactions" />  </QuillProvider>

app.acme.co

üöÄ Acme
=======

![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/chartsmissing.f5a34f6e.svg)

4
-

Push updates without looping in engineers
=========================================

app.quill.co

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/charts.ab4b31a8.svg)

![updatechart](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/singlechart.12e299db.svg)

app.acme.co

üöÄ Acme
=======

![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/charts.ab4b31a8.svg)

How it works
============

1
-

-

-

Add Quill to your app in a few lines of code
============================================

    import { QuillProvider, Dashboard } from "@quillsql/react"   <QuillProvider>     <Dashboard name="transactions" />  </QuillProvider>

app.acme.co

üöÄ Acme
=======

![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/chartsmissing.f5a34f6e.svg)

4
-

Push updates without looping in engineers
=========================================

app.quill.co

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/charts.ab4b31a8.svg)

![updatechart](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/singlechart.12e299db.svg)

app.acme.co

üöÄ Acme
=======

![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/charts.ab4b31a8.svg)

One unified platform. Purpose built for serving your customers
==============================================================

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)

Portal

app.quill.co

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/chartsmissing.f5a34f6e.svg)

Update dashboards without looping in engineers. You can even push reports to specific customers in seconds with multi-tenant access controls.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)

React Library

<Dashboard />

![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/chartsmissing.f5a34f6e.svg)

<Tables />

Don‚Äôt compromise on product. Make dashboards and reporting drive in-product actions. Use your existing UI components and theme, in your own codebase.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Cloud

Server

![frameworks](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/serverlang.924a7bdc.png)

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)

Server SDK

Database

![database](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/db.b573b9b9.svg)

Sensitive data never leaves your cloud. Use your existing authentication and server. Queries run in your own environment.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

One unified platform. Purpose built for serving your customers
==============================================================

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)

Portal

app.quill.co

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/chartsmissing.f5a34f6e.svg)

Update dashboards without looping in engineers. You can even push reports to specific customers in seconds with multi-tenant access controls.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![turn](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/turn.63f2c67a.svg)

![turn](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/turn.63f2c67a.svg)

Don‚Äôt compromise on product. Make dashboards and reporting drive in-product actions. Use your existing UI components and theme, in your own codebase.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)

React Library

<Dashboard />

![charts](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/chartsmissing.f5a34f6e.svg)

<Table />

![turn](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/turn.63f2c67a.svg)

![turn](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/turn.63f2c67a.svg)

Your Cloud

Server

![frameworks](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/serverlang.924a7bdc.png)

![Quill](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/quill.7847c2f3.svg)

Server SDK

Database

![database](https://quill.co/_next/static/media/db.b573b9b9.svg)

Sensitive data never leaves your cloud. Use your existing authentication and server. Queries run in your own environment.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Build In-Product Dashboards Quickly, Without Compromise
=======================================================

Spend your time on your core product, not building dashboards and reporting from scratch.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
